Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Fullerton
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Fullerton, Stockton, Cannon and Clark due to police activity near Clark/Fullerton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Fullerton, Stockton, Cannon, then resume their normal route on Clark due to police activity near Clark/Fullerton.

Allow extra travel time.
